phrases: So that flowers may bloom with innumerable deaths providing their nourishment,
So that flowers may bloom with innumerable deaths providing their nourishment,
there are countless tragedies buried at the bottom of this beautiful world.
there are countless tragedies buried at the bottom of this beautiful world.
there are countless tragedies buried at the bottom of this beautiful world.
there are countless tragedies buried at the bottom of this beautiful world.
But unless you are one of those directly concerned, this is not something you can know.
You should simply be captivated by the utterly dazzling beauty and push on,
You should simply be captivated by the utterly dazzling beauty and push on,
You should simply be captivated by the utterly dazzling beauty and push on,
You should simply be captivated by the utterly dazzling beauty and push on,
treading firmly on the ground below.
Do not leave me behind, Riko!
treading firmly on the ground below.
For your tragedy, too, is sure to become sustenance and give birth to the blooming of new flowers...
It is likely to stop any moment now, though.
I am just a fluffy stuffed doll.
I have come here to comfort you two...
Just who the heck are you?!
I am happy to properly introduce myself...
but first would not it be best to hear about how to save her?
What can I do to get her breathing again?!
Just blow a breath directly into her.
Like a kiss, you know, a kiss.
I cannot begin to express my gratitude...
It is still too early to relax.
Well, it seems she is not regaining consciousness.
You, come on and carry the girl back to my hideout.
I will find a way to do something for her...
Even though you do not know anything about us?!
Just keep a little distance between us, okay?
I suppose I never told you my name...
I am what you cave raiders would call...
Everyone, unable to resist, goes down in
Make those eyes shine brighter than a torch
The destination we are aiming for is deep
The trap of the open-mouthed netherworld
Let us chase the traces of truth
If an answer can be found now, we do not mind losing it all
So that we do not part with that voice
Even if that is a curse
The pulse is the real thing
Never again will the yearning stop
So you do not know about us, after all.
Well, I suppose you do not exactly look like a cave raider.
Hey, lay her down over here.
Nanachi, I do not mean to be rude,
but are not you about the same age as us?
In that case, you want to try finding someone else?
Among cave raiders, handling it like this is apparently common practice...
But that is just because they do not know the proper way to do it.
We will allow the poison to flow through her body and then get rid of it once it does.
This is medicine made from a friend of mine that I then hardened with wax.
When it is not possible to administer it orally,
you need to insert it in the butthole...
I am going to remove the smashed bone fragments and stitch up the blood vessels and flesh.
Look, this white thing is a nerve.
A number of them were damaged...
I am not good at stitching these, you know.
Still, the way you cut her is pretty gruesome...
It is a good thing she passed out...
Alright, I think that should do for the time being.
But, now comes the hard part.
I am going to need you to go out and fetch a bunch of stuff.
Just tell me what I need to do!
why did not you cut her at the elbow joint?
You could have taken her arm off from the joint without breaking the bone first...
Were you perhaps just following her directions?
If the part past the elbow is left intact,
then it totally changes the things it is possible to do when out cave raiding.
She was still determined to press on.
Even finding herself in that situation, she still did not give up on her adventure.
I still have not told you our names!
It is the first time anyone like you two has come here.
Ever since you entered my hunting grounds, I have been listening to everything you have said.
the presence I sensed right after we entered the fourth layer...
I was watching the entire time.
Otherwise, I would not be able to treat the orbed-piercer's poison, would I?
So, even when that thing attacked us, you were...
Yeah, I was watching... and I heard it all, too.
The look on your face says, Then why did not you help us?
I was simply interested in what the deal was with you guys, you see.
From the very beginning, I had no intention of showing myself.
S-so then, why did you save us?
Because I started to pity you.
You were sobbing like some lost little kid.
I could not bear to watch.
This is my cute little Mitty.
This girl is also a Hollow.
Have you heard about the strain of ascending in the sixth layer?
I am quite sure it was, the loss of your humanity or even death.
Right, if someone survives the Curse of the depths' sixth layer, this is what becomes of them.
As the name implies, they become a hollow husk of the person who once was.
No matter what anyone tries, they can never go back to the way they were.
That trick you used where you extended your arm...
Just thinking about what would happen if you did that on the sixth layer is pretty thrilling, huh?
Well, there is a reason, you see, that I am an exception among exceptions.
Do not get your hopes up.
If a cave raider becomes a Hollow,
their fellow cave raiders will put them to death and collect their belongings before moving on.
Given the alternative, I suppose it is far better to simply tell people they died.
In that environment, imagine putting yourself out in the open looking like I do.
I am living proof that it is possible to return from the sixth layer while retaining your humanity.
Naturally, people will come and try to capture me however they can, right?
Revealing myself is a big risk.
Even if it was only out of pity, getting saved is still a good thing, right?
Well, I am done sketching it now.
The materials necessary for healing Riko and the places to find them.
My awesome signature is on there, too.
She still has internal bleeding and her arm will rot off at this rate.
Listen, all I have done so far is delay her death.
She will manage to hold on for another 12 hours.
If it starts seeming like it will take longer than that, you better think of a tactful way to say goodbye.
I guess you cannot see it then, after all.
Later... I need to ask what that means exactly.
There is so much to keep up with that my mind is churning...
So, my eyes did not deceive me, after all.
This new Cartridge is just great.
It is all thanks to you, after all.
Let us celebrate the success of the experiment.
You can gather most of the stuff on the western side.
Stay out of the central region.
A demonfish, the bigger the better.
Choose one that displays clear color differentiation between its back and belly.
Find a spot with lots of it growing and pick the stuff that smells somewhat better.
Alright, I have collected it all now!
If we just leave her soaked in bloody pee, she will get a rash, right?
Make sure to wash it later.
Just calm down, you piece of junk.
Well, let us get started right away.
We are going to save Riko.
These water-mushrooms are parasitic, you see.
When it looks like their host, which has left the den by this point, is about to kick the bucket,
they share their stored-up nutrients and get their host going again.
If the number of shroombears in a new den increases, there will be more water-shrooms, too.
It is what is known as a symbiotic relationship.
While Riko's still unconscious, we are going to plant them on her and put'them to good use.
She is got a good vein there anyway, so we will plant'them right on her wound.
That should help the bone's healing process a bit, too.
They also help prevent the rotting of the flesh.
Well, they do hurt like crazy when you pull'them off, though.
Nanachi, what are you going to use the fish and the rest of the stuff for?
What would we do if I would been too late?!
Hey, you sure get noisy about every little thing...
What is all this business about being noisy?!
I have been watching over her this whole time, so it is not like I can go and find food myself, right?
If I collapse from hunger, who is going to treat her then?
As long as you understand now.
I know it does not look pretty, but at least this will save her life.
Her life is truly saved this time?!
There is a riverbed out back.
I will be going now, Lyza...
I was sure it was kicked away somewhere by the orbed-piercer...
You were staring intently at a girl's pee-stained clothes...
the Blaze Reap's right over there!
So, have you seriously become a piece of junk or what?
Well, you have been through a lot...
And while you are at it, wash this, too.
Was it the scenery of somewhere similar?
that was one of my own...
In that case, the one who was mourning for Lyza was...
No, Ozen said, No one was buried there.
The glittering waves that float in the sky
Let us bundle them and build a rainbow bridge
A dangerous foothold, a slope we slide on
A signpost of the past and future
Your left hand, with my right hand
Join it, connect us, and let us begin
In the past, the present, and also the future
So let us walk along without hesitating
Where will we head toward tomorrow?
If I can be together with you, the world will begin to shine
Let us search for flowers that bloom at the ends of the earth
